Package com.foreach.across.modules.properties.registries

Class EntityPropertiesRegistry

java.lang.Object
com.foreach.across.modules.properties.registries.EntityPropertiesRegistry
public abstract class EntityPropertiesRegistry extends Object
Allows modules to register extension properties. An EntityPropertiesRegistry requires the PropertyTrackingRepository to be active and exposed. The latter is automatically the case if the PropertiesModule is configured correctly.

The backing implementation uses a PropertyTypeRegistry and TypedPropertyMap supporting both simple and parameterized types.

Author:
Arne Vandamme
See Also:

    • unregister

      public void unregister(String propertyKey)
      Removes a property from the registry. This will not delete any of the stored values, only remove the configured type and conversion configuration. Any future actions done using this property key will revert to the default configuration being used.
      Parameters:
      propertyKey - Property key that should be unregistered.

    • getTypeForProperty

      public org.springframework.core.convert.TypeDescriptor getTypeForProperty(String propertyKey)
      Get the type associated with this property. If the property is known the registered type will be returned, else the registered type for unknown properties will be used. Returns the TypeDescriptor that can represent parameterized types.
      Parameters:
      propertyKey - Property key.
      Returns:
      TypeDescriptor for the given property.

    • getDefaultValueForProperty

      public Object getDefaultValueForProperty(String propertyKey)
      Will return the default value for a given property. If a PropertyFactory is registered, it will be invoked to create the value instance, else null will be returned.
      Parameters:
      propertyKey - Property key.
      Returns:
      Instance or null if none.

    • getClassForUnknownProperties

      public Class getClassForUnknownProperties()
      Returns:
      The class assumed for unknown properties.

    • setClassForUnknownProperties

      public void setClassForUnknownProperties(Class classForUnknownProperties)
      Set the class that unknown properties are assumed to be. Unless a more specific type is specified, a property will always be converted to this type.

      Only supports simple types.

      Parameters:
      classForUnknownProperties - Class that unknown

    • isRegistered

      public boolean isRegistered(String propertyKey)
      Parameters:
      propertyKey - Property key.
      Returns:
      True if a property is registered under that key.

    • getRegisteredProperties

      public Collection<String> getRegisteredProperties()
      Returns:
      The set of known properties.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Returns:
      True if no properties are registered.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the entire registry, removing all known properties.
